sqlMap.select: select MSG_ID, SEQ_NO, CD_FLAG, TRAN_DATE, ORG_TRAN_DATE, AMOUNT, OPP_ACCOUNT, OPP_NAME, OPP_BANK_CODE, COUNTRY_CODE, DISITRICT_CODE, TRAN_TYPE, TERM_LENGTH, TERM_UNIT, VALUE_DATE, EXPIRE_DATE, INTEREST_RATE, ISSUE_AMOUNT, ASSETS_TYPE, ASSETS_VALUE, EXCHANGE_TYPE, BUY_CURR, BUY_AMT, BUY_RATE, SELL_CURR, SELL_AMT, SELL_RATE, DOCUMENT_TYPE, DOCUMENT_NO, LOAN_TYPE, OVERDUE, SECURITIES_TYPE, SECURITIES_CODE, OPP_CUS_TYPE, CHK_STATUS, RSV1, RSV2, RSV3, MAK_USER_ID, MAK_DATETIME, CHK_USER_ID, CHK_DATETIME,CHK_ADD_WORD from FTZ_IN_TXN_DTL where MSG_ID = #msgId:VARCHAR# and SEQ_NO = #seqNo:DECIMAL#
sqlMap.delete: delete from FTZ_IN_TXN_DTL where MSG_ID = #msgId:VARCHAR# and SEQ_NO = #seqNo:DECIMAL#
sqlMap.insert: insert into FTZ_IN_TXN_DTL (MSG_ID, SEQ_NO, CD_FLAG, TRAN_DATE, ORG_TRAN_DATE, AMOUNT, OPP_ACCOUNT, OPP_NAME, OPP_BANK_CODE, COUNTRY_CODE, DISITRICT_CODE, TRAN_TYPE, TERM_LENGTH, TERM_UNIT, VALUE_DATE, EXPIRE_DATE, INTEREST_RATE, ISSUE_AMOUNT, ASSETS_TYPE, ASSETS_VALUE, EXCHANGE_TYPE, BUY_CURR, BUY_AMT, BUY_RATE, SELL_CURR, SELL_AMT, SELL_RATE, DOCUMENT_TYPE, DOCUMENT_NO, LOAN_TYPE, OVERDUE, SECURITIES_TYPE, SECURITIES_CODE, OPP_CUS_TYPE, CHK_STATUS, RSV1, RSV2, RSV3, MAK_USER_ID, MAK_DATETIME, CHK_USER_ID, CHK_DATETIME,CHK_ADD_WORD) values (#msgId:VARCHAR#, #seqNo:DECIMAL#, #cdFlag:CHAR#, #tranDate:VARCHAR#, #orgTranDate:VARCHAR#, #amount:DECIMAL#, #oppAccount:VARCHAR#, #oppName:VARCHAR#, #oppBankCode:VARCHAR#, #countryCode:CHAR#, #disitrictCode:CHAR#, #tranType:CHAR#, #termLength:DECIMAL#, #termUnit:CHAR#, #valueDate:VARCHAR#, #expireDate:VARCHAR#, #interestRate:DECIMAL#, #issueAmount:DECIMAL#, #assetsType:CHAR#, #assetsValue:DECIMAL#, #exchangeType:CHAR#, #buyCurr:CHAR#, #buyAmt:DECIMAL#, #buyRate:DECIMAL#, #sellCurr:CHAR#, #sellAmt:DECIMAL#, #sellRate:DECIMAL#, #documentType:CHAR#, #documentNo:VARCHAR#, #loanType:CHAR#, #overdue:CHAR#, #securitiesType:CHAR#, #securitiesCode:VARCHAR#, #oppCusType:CHAR#, #chkStatus:CHAR#, #rsv1:VARCHAR#, #rsv2:VARCHAR#, #rsv3:VARCHAR#, #makUserId:VARCHAR#, #makDatetime:VARCHAR#, #chkUserId:VARCHAR#, #chkDatetime:VARCHAR#, #chkAddWord:VARCHAR#)
sqlMap.update: update FTZ_IN_TXN_DTL set CD_FLAG = #cdFlag:CHAR#, TRAN_DATE = #tranDate:VARCHAR#, ORG_TRAN_DATE = #orgTranDate:VARCHAR#, AMOUNT = #amount:DECIMAL#, OPP_ACCOUNT = #oppAccount:VARCHAR#, OPP_NAME = #oppName:VARCHAR#, OPP_BANK_CODE = #oppBankCode:VARCHAR#, COUNTRY_CODE = #countryCode:CHAR#, DISITRICT_CODE = #disitrictCode:CHAR#, TRAN_TYPE = #tranType:CHAR#, TERM_LENGTH = #termLength:DECIMAL#, TERM_UNIT = #termUnit:CHAR#, VALUE_DATE = #valueDate:VARCHAR#, EXPIRE_DATE = #expireDate:VARCHAR#, INTEREST_RATE = #interestRate:DECIMAL#, ISSUE_AMOUNT = #issueAmount:DECIMAL#, ASSETS_TYPE = #assetsType:CHAR#, ASSETS_VALUE = #assetsValue:DECIMAL#, EXCHANGE_TYPE = #exchangeType:CHAR#, BUY_CURR = #buyCurr:CHAR#, BUY_AMT = #buyAmt:DECIMAL#, BUY_RATE = #buyRate:DECIMAL#, SELL_CURR = #sellCurr:CHAR#, SELL_AMT = #sellAmt:DECIMAL#, SELL_RATE = #sellRate:DECIMAL#, DOCUMENT_TYPE = #documentType:CHAR#, DOCUMENT_NO = #documentNo:VARCHAR#, LOAN_TYPE = #loanType:CHAR#, OVERDUE = #overdue:CHAR#, SECURITIES_TYPE = #securitiesType:CHAR#, SECURITIES_CODE = #securitiesCode:VARCHAR#, OPP_CUS_TYPE = #oppCusType:CHAR#, CHK_STATUS = #chkStatus:CHAR#, RSV1 = #rsv1:VARCHAR#, RSV2 = #rsv2:VARCHAR#, RSV3 = #rsv3:VARCHAR#, MAK_USER_ID = #makUserId:VARCHAR#, MAK_DATETIME = #makDatetime:VARCHAR#, CHK_USER_ID = #chkUserId:VARCHAR#, CHK_DATETIME = #chkDatetime:VARCHAR#, CHK_ADD_WORD = #chkAddWord:VARCHAR# where MSG_ID = #msgId:VARCHAR# and SEQ_NO = #seqNo:DECIMAL#

update FTZ_IN_TXN_DTL
CD_FLAG = #cdFlag:CHAR#
TRAN_DATE = #tranDate:VARCHAR#
ORG_TRAN_DATE = #orgTranDate:VARCHAR#
AMOUNT = #amount:DECIMAL#
OPP_ACCOUNT = #oppAccount:VARCHAR#
OPP_NAME = #oppName:VARCHAR#
OPP_BANK_CODE = #oppBankCode:VARCHAR#
COUNTRY_CODE = #countryCode:CHAR#
DISITRICT_CODE = #disitrictCode:CHAR#
TRAN_TYPE = #tranType:CHAR#
TERM_LENGTH = #termLength:DECIMAL#
TERM_UNIT = #termUnit:CHAR#
VALUE_DATE = #valueDate:VARCHAR#
EXPIRE_DATE = #expireDate:VARCHAR#
INTEREST_RATE = #interestRate:DECIMAL#
ISSUE_AMOUNT = #issueAmount:DECIMAL#
ASSETS_TYPE = #assetsType:CHAR#
ASSETS_VALUE = #assetsValue:DECIMAL#
EXCHANGE_TYPE = #exchangeType:CHAR#
BUY_CURR = #buyCurr:CHAR#
BUY_AMT = #buyAmt:DECIMAL#
BUY_RATE = #buyRate:DECIMAL#
SELL_CURR = #sellCurr:CHAR#
SELL_AMT = #sellAmt:DECIMAL#
SELL_RATE = #sellRate:DECIMAL#
DOCUMENT_TYPE = #documentType:CHAR#
DOCUMENT_NO = #documentNo:VARCHAR#
LOAN_TYPE = #loanType:CHAR#
OVERDUE = #overdue:CHAR#
SECURITIES_TYPE = #securitiesType:CHAR#
SECURITIES_CODE = #securitiesCode:VARCHAR#
OPP_CUS_TYPE = #oppCusType:CHAR#
CHK_STATUS = #chkStatus:CHAR#
MAK_USER_ID = #makUserId:VARCHAR#
MAK_DATETIME = #makDatetime:VARCHAR#
CHK_USER_ID = #chkUserId:VARCHAR#
CHK_DATETIME = #chkDatetime:VARCHAR#
CHK_ADD_WORD = #chkAddWord:VARCHAR#
where MSG_ID = #msgId:VARCHAR# and SEQ_NO = #seqNo:DECIMAL#
and MAK_DATETIME = #rsv1:VARCHAR#
and CHK_DATETIME = #rsv2:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.sql:
where 1=1
and MSG_ID = #msgId#
and CHK_STATUS = #chkStatus:CHAR#
order by MSG_ID,SEQ_NO
